patient_info: Nocturia,Proteinuria,Glomerulonephritis,Renal cyst,Hydronephrosis,Blurred vision,Hematuria,IgA deposition in the glomerulus,Hypertension,Syncope,Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy,Weight loss,Palpitations,Hypertriglyceridemia,Hypercholesterolemia,Elevated circulating creatinine concentration,Supraventricular arrhythmia,Ventricular septal hypertrophy,Abnormality of the gallbladder,Premature ventricular contraction,Pedal edema,Right bundle branch block,Abnormal ST segment,Chronic kidney disease,Left ventricular diastolic dysfunction,Chest pain
golden_diagnosis: 法布雷病/Fabry disease/Fabry disease/Fabry disease,法布雷病/Fabry disease/Fabry disease/Fabry disease,法布雷病/Fabry disease/Fabry disease/Fabry disease
predict_diagnosis:
1. Fabry disease
2. Mitochondrial myopathy, renal failure, and hepatic steatosis (MELAS syndrome)
3. Autosomal dominant polycystic kidney disease (ADPKD) with cardiac manifestations
4. Dense deposit disease (Type II membranoproliferative glomerulonephritis)
5. Uromodulin kidney disease (formerly known as familial juvenile hyperuricemic nephropathy)
6. Cardiomyopathy with end-stage renal disease (non-ischemic cardiomyopathy with renal involvement)
7. Alport syndrome with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy and arrhythmias
8. Loin pain hematuria syndrome with systemic manifestations
9. Primary hyperoxaluria with renal and cardiac complications
10. Tubulointerstitial nephritis with uveitis syndrome (TINU) with associated cardiac abnormalities

Please note that this list is speculative and based on the symptoms provided. Confirmation of any diagnosis would require a thorough clinical evaluation, including detailed family history, genetic testing, laboratory studies, imaging, and potentially biopsy of affected organs.
